entry.name: AstraMilitarum/OrkHuntersTrapDescription
entry.value: Lays a trap that slows and damages enemy infantry.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/OrkHuntersTrapFlavor
entry.value: Armageddon Ork Hunters deftly lay pitfall traps to halt any would-be attackers. Da Boyz aren't so tough with broken legs and half of them impaled.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PurgingFlamesDescription
entry.value: Burns away Orkoid Fungus and Forests.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/PurgingFlamesFlavor
entry.value: Merely killing an Ork isn't enough. Their corpses leave behind fungi, which if left unchecked, will sprout Greenskin monstrosities in the future. Enter: holy prometheum.
